name: 李老师不是你老师
content: October 17, Shanghai. The blogger used the 9 yuan hourly wage of a roadside security guard to test his purchasing power in a supermarket. His goal was to buy rice, flour, oil, meat, eggs, milk, fruits and vegetables. He found that he could not afford most fruits and vegetables, bagged rice, oil, etc. In the end, he bought a bag of milk, 0.1 kg of rice, two potatoes, 4 duck wings, a pear and two eggs, spending a total of 10 yuan. The blogger joked, "9 yuan bought so many things. Social development is really good. Great praise."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 16, medical staff at Shanwei People's Hospital held up banners reading "We want to eat" while collectively demanding their wages.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: October 18, Japan. A Chinese man saw a Japanese skateboarder on the steps, so he kept cursing him, "Fall him to death, fall him to death." When the other person fell down by mistake, the man and his friend laughed happily.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: October 18 (Released) Jiangxi. Students dressed in Red Army uniforms performed a scene of beating landlords during the land reform period. The students in the audience applauded. Currently, the video has been deleted.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 18, Putin met with representatives of BRICS countries at the presidential residence and compared China to the sun. He said, "The United States has tried to stop China's development through various means, but this is like preventing the sun from rising, which is impossible." Putin also said, "Australia, Japan and New Zealand are like puppies tied by the United States.
